## rv-img

rv-img

## beforeLoad

called before an elements gets handled

**Parameters**

-   `element`  

## afterLoad

called after an element was successfully handled

**Parameters**

-   `element`  

## onError

called whenever an element could not be handled

**Parameters**

-   `element`  

## onFinishedAll

called once all elements was handled
